QuestData.Title: Galaen's Fate
QuestData.Description: You have no means of identifying the corpse as Galaen with the information Morae gave you, but the clothing appears to have been torn in search of valuables.$B$BThe blood elves in the area would've claimed anything of value from the wreckage, including Galaen's jeweled amulet.$B$BAlthough her husband did not survive the crash, you believe that Morae would be grateful if you recovered her husband's amulet from the blood elves.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Galaen's Amulet to Morae at Blood Watch.
QuestData.CompletionText: <Morae looks at you hopefully.>$B$BDid your search turn up any trace of Galaen?
QuestData.RewardText: <You tell Morae of your findings in the wreckage of the Cryo-Core.>$B$BSo... he's...$B$BI guess I knew on some level, but just wouldn't let myself believe it. It's not the news I was hoping for, but you have my deepest thanks for finding Galaen.
